name: EZ powerPress/podPress Addon Widget
author: Eli Scheetz

sections.description:
Just place the Widget on your sidebar to display links to your podCasts.

This plugin requires that powerPress or podPress is already installed.

Plugin Updated Sept-28th
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin into your WordPress plugins directory (usually /wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
  3. Place the widget on your sidebar through the ‘Widgets’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
sections.faq:
What do I do after I activate the Plugin?

Go to the Widgets menu in the WordPress Admin and add the “List podCasts” Widget to your Sidebar or Footer Area.

Why am I not seeing the Widget on my site after I add it to the sidebar?

You might not have any podCasts or you don’t have powerPress or podpress installed.
sections.changelog:
1.5.09

  • Removed all debugging and session code.
  • Upgraded widget to be compatible with WordPress 4.3
  • Added Angelo Mandato as a committer.

1.2.05.23

  • Added support for powerPress podCasts.
  • Added Category filter to the Widget setting.

1.2.03.13

  • First versions uploaded to WordPress.

short_description: This plugin is an Addon for powerPress or podPress that gives you a Widget to lists your podCasts and links to the popout player.
description:
Just place the Widget on your sidebar to display links to your podCasts.

This plugin requires that powerPress or podPress is already installed.

Plugin Updated Sept-28th
